alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Levy; Inland Citrus; Inland Levy (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 6:02PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Citrus and southeastern Levy Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 602 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Rainbow Lakes Estates, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Homosassa Springs, Crystal River Airport, Black Diamond, Inglis, Pine Ridge, Lebanon, Citronelle, Crystal Manor, Crystal Oaks, Citrus Springs and Lecanto. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Citrus; Coastal Levy; Inland Citrus; Inland Levy
